Html:
Hi,

 

       Recently i started working on Silverlight application using Prism Architecture.I am in need of the following:

gsree

Hi gsree,

Although I do not know what kind of implementation you have of a Silverlight Multiselect Combobox (I was not able to find any in Silverlight 3 or the Silverlight Toolkit), the following links might be useful:

  • ICommand for Silverlight with Attached Behaviors
  • C# Code Snippet to Create Commands with Attached Behaviors using Prism

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
Thanks dschenkelman, the problem got resolved.Thanks once again.
